title: World War II Memorial: Places
body: Places       The Memorial In Context It is here, on the National Mall in Washington, D.C., where the United States proudly proclaims the continuity of our Union and protects the memories of those who have struggled to maintain and perfect it. The World War II Memorial occupies a place of honor along this central vista, and takes its rightful place among some of the great icons of American history. More...      The Memorial Elements Numerous elements fit together to tell the story of World War II and the "Greatest Generation." Click here to read more.         National Park Service Sites Related To World War II  Aleutian World War II National Historical Park, Aleutian Islands American Memorial Park, Northern Mariana Islands Edward R.
